name: Listened to Inside the hirings of Mario Cristobal and Dan Radakovich with Rudy Fernandez

content.html:
Manny catches up with Rudy Fernandez, Julio Frenk’s Chief of Staff at the University of Miami and senior vice president for public affairs and communications to discuss some of the intricate details of the Mario Cristobal hiring and where the money came from, staffing outside of assistant coaches and the importance of bringing in former Clemson AD Dan Radakovich. They also talk NIL deals with local billionaire booster John H. Ruiz, the future of a Canes football stadium and more. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

By Wide Right: A show about the Miami Hurricanes
